text: I am extremely inconvenienced by all this as well.

contains_idioms: 浮き彫り に する

original_text: ドムが神の目を奪ったから レーダーから逃れるためだ

original_text: 現場では常に― こちらの裏を かこうとする敵が相手だ

text: To me, that's worth a little risk.
original_text: 多少の危険は覚悟の上よ

text: With all due respect, this is not the time or the place to share the details.
original_text: 言葉を返して申し訳ないが　今は 詳細な情報を口にすべき 時期でもないし場所でもない

text: I'm a very reasonable man as long as you cooperate, so let me ask you a question, Rick.
original_text: 協力する限り、俺は話が分かる男だ、 一言聞くぜ、リック。

text: Saviors can actually be quite reasonable.
original_text: 救世主は話が分かるんだ。

text: Look, you can't be doing this right now.
original_text: それとこれとは話が違う

text: I shouldn't have encouraged her, but you know what little children are like these days.
original_text: 調子に乗りすぎたよ この年頃の小さな子供ってこうだろう

text: This little game cuts both ways.
original_text: このやり方は諸刃の剣だぞ

text: You wait till it turns ugly.
original_text: だが、豹変するだろう

text: I'm flushed. Must be the wine.
original_text: 赤くなっちゃった このワインのせいね

text: Are you blushing?
original_text: 赤くなった

text: If a new chocolatier opens up, there's no way she won't stop by.
original_text: ＜新しい ショコラティエが オープンして 足を運ばないわけがない＞

text: I need you to trust me.
original_text: 俺に身を任せろ

text: My girlfriend and I, we're thinking of settling down.
original_text: この春　自分　身を固めようと思いまして

text: Please, don't go down this road again, ok?
original_text: 頼む、同じ轍を踏むな、いいな？

contains_idioms: 途方 に 暮れる
text: I didn't know how I was going to manage with a small boy, with no money and no regular job.
original_text: 途方に暮れたよ 子連れで文無し 定職もない

text: I shall revel in that fire! In that fire I shall find my bride!
original_text: 光の中　俺のために道が開いている

text: It helped expose me to things that my parents or friends didn't show me.
original_text: いろんな道が開けてきました 両親に教わらなかったことも

text: You did exactly what I told you not to do!
original_text: あれほど釘を刺したろ

text: That not for a single moment did his courage waver.
original_text: 一度も音を上げなかった

text: All right. From the top.
original_text: わかった、じゃあ頭から

text: MIA since early 2003 and presumed dead... until now.
original_text: 2003初頭からMIA 戦死者扱いだった だが もう違う

text: So at the beginning of my third year... I went and apologized to my coach and asked to start all over again.
original_text: ３年生の頭から 監督に謝りに行って

text: The Agency appreciates everything your people are doing.
original_text: あなた方　捜査官には 頭が下がるけれど

text: Then why'd you come up here if you're so smart?
original_text: そんなに頭が切れるなら 何故ここに来たの？

text: Even if my head hurts, no one knows until I cry.
original_text: "私が頭が痛くても" "痛い顔したり" "声 出したり"

text: I put it on my to do list ". Thanks.
original_text: 頭に入れておきます　ありがとう

text: Next time stay put, you won't need a map.
original_text: 地図は頭に入れておけ

text: It was the Dragons we bowed to and now the Dragons are dead!
original_text: 俺達が頭を下げたのはドラゴンだ そしてドラゴンはもう死んだ！

text: My friends you bow to no one.
original_text: 友よ... 君達は... 誰にも 頭を下げなくていい

text: Chill out. Can we just talk about this? What's your name?
original_text: 頭を冷やそう　ここじゃ無理だ 名前は？

text: I need some air.
original_text: 頭を冷やしてくる

text: - Oh my baby! - You're really here. - Let me look at you.
original_text: ベイビー　よく顔を見せて

text: I told you never to show your face here again but here you are... snooping around with this...
original_text: 2度と顔を見せるなと言ったのに また帰ってきた こいつと こそこそと...

text: Well, george is capable of a lot of things.
original_text: あいつは食えない奴だ

text: You are so full of shit, Patty.
original_text: 君は本当に食えない女だな

text: That means two more heads are about to roll.
original_text: あと 2人の首が 飛ぶのね

text: That's very kind to say. Unless it stopped being a job because someone fired you, in which case...
original_text: 優しいな　どうでもいいが 誰かに首にされたとして

text: - You are firing me.
original_text: −君は私を首にする。

text: "I got fired from my job. I got kicked out of my apartment."
original_text: 「仕事を首になって アパートから追い出された」

text: I didn't lose your job for you, Wade, you did that.
original_text: お前が首になったのは お前自身のせいだ

text: And it better be soon, because the Vice President's about to fire us all.
original_text: 急いだ方が良いぞ 副大統領が皆の首を切ろうとしてる

text: Instead you went to Omaha to fire people for a living?
original_text: ところが君は生活の為に オマハで人の首を切りに行った

contains_idioms: 首 を 長い する
text: he's been waiting for you a real long time,man.
original_text: 彼は君を首を長くして待っているぞ

text: Who is this bimbo, Barney?
original_text: どこの馬の骨だ バーニー？

text: I don't fucking know you. What business?
original_text: 何所の馬の骨だ　何の話だ？

text: I didn't know you at all.
original_text: お前は馬の骨だった

text: If you are to become my business partner, Macduff, you've got to start showing some backbone!
original_text: 僕の ビジネスパートナーなら 気骨がある所を 見せてみろ！

text: That girl has an iron backbone.
original_text: 彼女は鉄の気骨がある

text: The checking of the suspects had been thorough, painstaking, and tedious.
original_text: 取り調べは徹底的で 骨が折れ 退屈な作業だ

text: Though, you know, finding a worthy opponent has been a little challenging.
original_text: 強敵を見つけるには 骨が折れるが

text: No, I reject this idea of abandoning my country.
original_text: 僕は移住はしない この国に骨を埋める

text: but I intend to stay at this bank for the rest of my career.
original_text: せっかくですが私は この銀行に 骨を埋める所存でおります

text: Oh, I've been pulling their chestnuts out of the fire, legally speaking, for five years.
original_text: 彼らの為に骨を折った事がある、 法的に言えば、5年の刑のを。

text: In your defense, I worked very hard to blind you.
original_text: 君を弁護するとすれば、 君が何も見えない様に私が骨を折ったのだ。

text: I will see what we can do.
original_text: 一つ骨を折ってみよう

text: Master Skywalker should be proud.
original_text: マスター・スカイウォーカーは鼻が高いでしょう

text: Phoenix. Risen from the ashes.
original_text: フェニックス 灰の中から生まれ変わる不死鳥だ

text: You seem like a changed person.
original_text: あんた 人が変わったみたい

text: Yes. Uh, those two are the bad guys.
original_text: この２人が　悪い奴で

text: You won't make any progress... until you recognize your dreams for what they are.
original_text: 進歩は始まらないよ 夢の意味を認めらないまま

text: I'm not gonna get over anything by just lying on the couch. It's not a good idea.
original_text: 考えてみてくれ 長椅子に寝ていても何も始まらない

text: I don't like someone else's hands on my girls.
original_text: 他の誰かが彼女の手を取っていたらいやだな

text: So will you just take your hands off me?
original_text: だから、ちょうど私から手を取るのだろうか？

text: Ser Mandon, you will bear the King's banner.
original_text: サー・マンドンは王の旗を掲げろ

text: I was told that she requested emergency leave.
original_text: 休暇を取ったと 聞きましたが

text: What, are you worried that your net worth makes you a target?
original_text: 何を心配してるの 純資産が　標的になるの？

text: the head of the world criminal court, it would make sense for me to be a target.
original_text: 世界刑事裁判所の代表として 標的になるのが私の役目だ

text: Before you lose your edge, before you become a target.
original_text: 限界を見失う前に 標的になる前に

text: From here the tension passes on to your fingers.
original_text: 指が硬くなってる

text: Imagine going to school with that in your head.
original_text: それ聞いたあと学校に 行く息子の身になってもみろって

text: The defense would have you walk in his client's shoes.
original_text: 弁護側は "被告の身になって" と言うでしょう

text: So if you are gonna put yourself in anyone's shoes... put yourself... in Gloria Mitchell's.
original_text: だから 誰かの 身になって考えるなら どうか グロリアさんの 身になって考えて

text: Believe me, Marty, you're better off without having to worry about all the aggravation and headaches of playing at that dance.
original_text: オーディションに落ちたのは 幸いなんだよ パーティーでの演奏なんて 頭が痛いぞ

text: I'm getting a bad feeling about where this is headed.
original_text: 最悪の状況で頭が痛いです
